archimate:BusinessEvent.name: Tech specialist "Architects" don’t know about architecture and don’t want to.
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation: Tech specialists love create new technical solutions and are even happy drawing them in Visio. Their passion is the technology, not the overall solution or how different layers of architecture fit together. They often see modelling languages as pointless and think of a design as being a document rather than a connection of related elements all working together and managed and optimized.
